name: Wholegrain Mustard (Salt-Free)
properties: Adds texture and flavor to dressings
benefits: Salt-free wholegrain mustard is a prepared condiment made from mustard seeds, vinegar, and spices. The wholegrain variety contains visible mustard seeds that add texture and nutritional benefits. It provides tangy, slightly spicy flavor to salad dressings, sauces, and marinades without added sodium. Mustard contains beneficial compounds including glucosinolates that support health while enhancing flavor in weight-loss recipes.

quotes: Hearty, chewy rye grains are featured in this salad made with chickpeas, veggies and a zesty mustard dressing
Add the Light Vegetable Broth, nutritional yeast, lemon juice, miso paste, mustard
